reviews.review:
Yes, yes I don't have much time on record here, but I've played it through three times on console on hard, ditto the DLC, so I know what I'm talking about. 

Holy shit. When people ask if games can be art, this is one of the strongest examples I can cite. 
 
The story and certainly the ending are perhaps the most unforgettable I've ever seen in a video game. Yes, I have played Fallout, Mass Effect, and The Walking Dead.
Elizabeth is an incredible character. Her character arc, from the start of the game to the end of Burial at Sea (seriously, get the season pass; Burial at Sea Episode 2 is the best DLC I've ever played) is fascinating to watch. She grows and changes like a real person. I have never cared about the welfare of a video game character as much as I've cared about keeping Elizabeth safe. THE best game character I've ever encountered.
The graphics in the first game, released eight years ago, are still impressive to this day. This game is a quarter of that age, and holy hell, it's more than frequently a jaw-dropping spectacle to behold. There were countless moments where I just wanted to stand and look at something for a few minutes. 
The combat is a bit simple; perhaps a bit more than it should be for a game with a story this complex, but it's still plenty fun, highlighted by Clash in the Clouds. The vigors are fun and weird, with great animations. 
Can't remember encountering a single glitch, or even a framerate dip, and I was playing on console because I'm a dirty casual. 
The weapons feel great. The Hand Cannon is exactly that. One headshot will turn a bad guy's dome into a cloud of red meat, the sniper rifle fires high-speed trains in place of bullets, and firing the shotgun is not too different from hitting your enemies with a car. 

So basically what I'm saying is, this game is fantastic. One of the greatest games ever made. 10/10. The plot, character development, graphics, and ending are mind-blowingly fantastic. This was one of the key games that defined the last generation. Buy it. Seriously. Cannot recommend it highly enough.
While I preferred the setting of Rapture to Columbia, I did find myself more emotionally invested in this game than either of the first two. Excellent story. Excellent game.

世界観、グラフィックが大好きです。ふとしたときにまたやりたくなる。

Behold, a game that's fun, a game that's rich in story and characters, with one of the best npcs in all of gaming, a game that can be replayed countless times and still you'll learn something more about the story and characters.

On it's own it's a fantastic piece of art and commentary on the state of videogames (i.e. - the illusion of choice)

If you're getting dlc, do yourself a favor: get the season pass. You'll be much more satisfied, then if you bought seperatly.

What I'm telling you is, do yourself a favor and get it now.

Отполированная до блеска история. Умопомрачительная анимация лиц. Непредсказуемая концовка, которая ломает мозг особо(и не очень) впечатлительным. + Главная героиня построена по образу и подобию Анны Молевой. 
Это лучшая история в моей жизни. Ибо все здесь сделано с душой.
终于通关了，最后的剧情让我感觉到这个游戏是一个大写的艺术。

The best atmophere in a game I've experienced in a loooong time. Its a good shooter, a good story game and a good challenge i you play on hard. The weapon/power system is a bit annoying at times but that's the only bad thing I can say about the game. If you want a good fps all about singleplayer story, get this game. If it's on sale, just buy it anyway :)

Indebted to the wrong people, with his life on the line, veteran of the U.S. Cavalry and now hired gun, Booker DeWitt has only one opportunity to wipe his slate clean. He must rescue Elizabeth, a mysterious girl imprisoned since childhood and locked up in the flying city of Columbia. Forced to trust one another, Booker and Elizabeth form a powerful bond during their daring escape. Together, they learn to harness an expanding arsenal of weapons and abilities, as they fight on zeppelins in the clouds, along high-speed Sky-Lines, and down in the streets of Columbia, all while surviving the threats of the air-city and uncovering its dark secret.
Игра класс!!!

[h1]Must have[/h1]

I don't always finish my games, but when I played Bioshock Infinite, I finished it twice. DLCs included. 

Masterpiece.
All the ingredient of success : fun gameplay, beautiful graphics and world design, incredible story.

Pros :

- Incredible story, with stunning details and love put into the creation of this universe.
- Characters are fabulous, with background story for all of them, if you wish to learn more about the universe.
- Wonderful art and world design. Columbia lives up to Rapture's hype. 
- Elizabeth.
- DLCs in pre-civil war Rapture. Wonderful to see the city alive.
- Gameplay is smooth, and unlike what some comments might have said, combat is nervous. I liked it anyways, and it's an improvement on the previous titles.
- Perfectly suited soundtrack.


Cons :

- You'll never be happy again.
- You'll need to google the ending because you'll be mindf*cked, especially if you are not native english speaker and play the game in english.
- You'll have to explain your soulmate why you want to name your daughter Elizabeth.
这故事真是黑暗

玩过《生化奇兵：无限》之后感叹，人类的苦难都来源于自身的罪恶，而罪恶都来源于心魔。

如果遇到卡顿问题，可以尝试以下步骤：
1. 在 Steam 里设置启动选项 -ReadTexturePoolFromIni
2. 打开文件 %USERPROFILE%\Documents\My Games\BioShock Infinite\XGame\Config\XEngine.ini
3. 修改 [TextureStreaming] 一节中的 PoolSize 值为显存大小 - 600，如 1GB 显存设置为 1000 - 600 = 400

Мне понравилас игруха
Ce jeu est absolument magnifique, tant par son scénario que par les ses graphismes.

本人比较懒，就将整个生化奇兵系列的评测写一起吧

我就是从 无限 第一次接触生化奇兵系列，当年我对这款游戏的印象就是，漂亮，够爽，神优化！哦，还有 真特么大。

在玩完无限之后不禁惊叹于编剧的脑洞，同时也促使我下载了系列的1,2两作。

然而并没有玩完。。。

一直到今年秋冬特卖，我一口气入手了系列全部内容，同时在2015年11月30日，开始在熊猫TV直播，直播的正是生化奇兵系列，一共用了4天打穿了全系列。

该系列的特点，漂亮，够爽，脑洞大。脑洞大在乱七八糟的人际关系，在各种活灵活现的人物塑造，布克，伊丽莎白，方丁，雷恩，等等等等。每一个人物都无法简单的用善恶来评价，当游戏人物无法简单地用善恶来评价时，我觉得这些人物的塑造就称得上“丰满”了，生化奇兵系列的人物相当“丰满”！

他们构建了一个神奇的世界，亚当质，异能，小萝莉与大老爹，海底或天上的城市，女儿或别人的女儿。。。

每个人物与世界观相融合，他们的存在造成了世界的改变，世界的改变改变了他们，仿佛他们就是整个世界，就像是人类永恒的论题，是人类生于世界还是世界生于人类？

以上是我瞎扯的。

好吧，这一系列游戏都有着极强的代入感，同时各种游戏中的细节，比如路（xiao）人（guai）的对话，收集到的录音，都将玩家的思维带入到其独有的世界观中 -- 一个在海底/天空生活的有异能的上/上上个世纪的人类社会。

游戏中的人与现实中的人有着相同与不同，虚虚实实之间莫名其妙的生出了一种反差与近似，这大概就是我所说的代入感，以现实中的人类代入到游戏中必然有着不同，而将不同与相同的平衡做到极致的，大概就是生化奇兵了。

其实我还是在扯。

不过这一系列的世界观之惊奇，人物塑造之丰满，代入感之强都是无可厚非的。

而能将这三者涵盖，串联的一个词，大概就是 故事 ，一个每一位玩家都能经历的故事。

飞机坠落，到达灯塔，坐进潜水球，被迫看一段中二视频，眼前林立的高楼与其间穿行的五彩鱼群、庞然巨鲸，都将投影幕帘撤走时的那一句“销魂城”刻入脑地，今生难忘。这，是故事的开始。

乘一艘小舟，到一处灯塔，敲五响银铃，回漫天洪音。杀入高塔，救出少女，逃遍天地，战遍红蓝。纯情少女终成神，幡然悔悟溺己死。

你以为这是故事的结束？你肯定没买海葬。。。

在此友情提醒，一定要买海葬！一定要买海葬！一定要买海葬！

海葬将无限与1，2代的剧情串联，把这一切有限的故事变成了无限的回味。

而为什么我没怎么提2代？

因为2代是对我震撼最大的！

海葬起始帧帧美如画，美不过水中的倒影。

1代主角与5位小萝莉度过了余生，布克被一群女儿摁水里溺死，都是美好的结局，却哪里比得上与女儿合体的二代！

不需多言，生化奇兵系列是游戏玩家不容错过的神作，而如果你还在为是否错过了什么好游戏而烦恼，请进http://panda.tv/157924，我将为您排忧解难。

这广告打得我自己都笑了。

毫无人气的新人小主播请各位原谅。
Plays, Played, Will Play.

Just fucking buy it,it's worth every penny.

Très décu par ce dernier épisode, bien qu'on y retrouve une musique très agréable, une touche artistique indéniable. Il n'est pas un bioshock. L'ambiance glauque et sombre a disparu au profit d'un univers faussement ouvert, ce qui n'en fait pas le monde des bisounours pour autant. La réflexion sur le libéralisme présent en sous texte dans les deux premiers épisodes est remplacé par un délire sauce philosophie quantique. 
Le seul choix du jeu, n'a pas d'interet ni d'influence sur notre aventure et on traverse les plateformes en espérant atteindre la fin. 
Bioshock infinite reste un excellent jeu, mais aurait gagné à ne pas être integré au Bioshock, il aurait pû s'affirmer en tant que réelle aventure et prendre plus de liberté là où il reste dans l'ombre des véritables réflexions et de la superbe DA des deux premiers. 
L'add-on Burial at the Sea par contre, est un vrai bijou, typé roman noir qui vaut à lui seul bien plus que le jeu principal. Celui-ci mérite sa place dans l'arc des bioshock.
Amazing story-telling!

The best of this game is the concept art. It's fucking great and it's created in an awesome atmosphere. In fact it was the first thing that makes me want to play it and it didn't disappoint me in that way.
The rest is too boring. The story is in some sort psychodelic and is that kind of game that you are specting all time the moment when it finish but it never comes. By the middle of the game I was hoping the end because of the monotony of the story. Its always the same problem with the same dramatic moralistic filosophy.
I don't recommend it to nobody who want a nice story.

Это вам не Биошок 3 какой нибудь. И не Байошок 3. Блин, играл давно. Помню там вроде стрелять в кого-то надо. Можно даже сжигать\замораживать\бить током\натравить ворон и много ещё всяких сверхспособностей. На каком-то крюке надо ездить. Дело это всё было где-то высоко на небесах. Какая-то баба загадочная со мной белала всё. Вроде даже помогала. Потом её чо-то украли. Потом вернули. Или не вернули? Там заплёт какой то был. Потом расплёт. По итогу мне это всё понравилось и я вам, короче, рекомендую! Забавно что играл по времени 23 часа, столько же и во вторую часть. А может и не забавно.

Bioshock Infinite is a first person sci-fi shooter game, developed by Irrational Games on the Unreal Engine. It follows Ex-Pinkerton Booker Dewitt on an employ to retreive a girl named Elizabeth, in the 1912 city of Columbia.

It's clear from the start that the developers of Infinite knew what they were doing. Opening with a thick atmosphere and an alarming amount of detail in the environment. The game plays on conventions in clever ways that manage to hold true to the important bits of plot structure, whilst still managing to surprise even the most observant of players.

The action is quick and precise, with a nice sense of style, but with little reaction from enemies before death it feels a little bit too cut and dry. There's a decent effort to spice it up with powers and mele, along with upgradable abilities and gear, but none of these qualities make for much of a solution. 

Luckily, the action still remains varied, with the ability to glide around the arena on rails, and a nice assortment of different enemies and ammo lying around. And your partner throughout the game manages to be a saving grace rather than a liability, providing you with ammo while still keeping themselves safe.

The story and presentation are cinematic, but always move at the pace of the players, allowing for in depth exploration of the games world, along with audio diaries and upgrades to find in the more reclusive parts of the levels. There's a decent amounts of twists and turns before the big reveal in the final act, and this constant change of pace may be disorienting to some, but still does a great job at mantaining the players interest throughout the playthrough, which lasts about 40 hours at most.

This is a game with character and precision, it manages to feel beleivable with even the most bizarre of plot points, and the finale manages to stick in the players head long after finishing the campaign. I couldn't recommend it enough.

Перед тем как вышла эта игра. я играл в первую и вторую часть биошока...и понял...что скорее всего 3-я часть меня разачарует.....но...вот недавно...на распродаже я ее все-таки купил...и понял...это совсем другая игра....настолько поразительная что просто дух захватывает...ну а скаченный рисификатор всех речей и вывесок в игре...просто оживил игру и сделал другой...это однозначно 10/10
i love it

Simplesmente BIOSHOCK, embora pra mim o primeiro seja o melhor, não tenho criticas para esse jogo, como esperado de um bioshock e da 2K, e com certeza o melhor bioshock se tratando de graficos sem falar que o jogo roda muito bem mesmo com graficos tão lindos, recomendo que pegue a trilogia será um ótimo investimento se tratando de jogos!!!!

美到可以当壁纸的画面，平行世界，当完全明白了剧情之后恍然大悟，第一次玩的盗版，解锁了入正 又玩一遍，剧情真心太赞，令人印象深刻的配乐，有几个瞬间我鸡皮疙瘩都起来了，如果拍成电影一定也是部神作。
一句话，游戏中不可多得的艺术品

Mind blown story 10/10

One of the best games I've ever played. Played the ps3 version a while back and loved it, playing the pc version only made it better and the DLCs are masterfully tied into the insane way that this story is laid out and I loved every minute of it.
This is such a great game. It's got one of the most interesting plot twists is all the stories. Also the characters have,well,character.

Great story and gameplay! graphics look great, and its really fun to play. It isnt as good as the original Bioshock (doesnt have nearly as much jump scares, and the atmosphere isnt creepy at all), however it has great game mechanics, weapons, and vigors. This is less of a horror game, but its still great!

Bioshock Infinite starts out with a dinstinct ambiance that like the call a siren lures you near the rocks to only discover that it's a linear shoot-em-up where your choices don't matter, your journey never changes, and the ending always remains the same - Regardless, there is some entertainment to be found, albeit tedious at time.  

Since there is not a"MEH" option I'll round up...

Que decir de esta saga que no se haya dicho ya.Ken Levine marcho un hito con System Shock y lo volvio a hacer con la saga Bioshock,una saga que trasmite muy bien una historia utopica hacerca de la filosofia objetivista e individualista y como Ryan un visionario crea una ciudad huyendo de los gobiernos (Bioshock 1).En el dos nos encarnamos en un big daddy haciendo la experiencia totalmente distinta a la del uno,en este no interviene Ken Levine ni su equipo pero el juego cumple y es fiel al universo Bioshock.Y ya para terminar la historia nos sumergimos en Columbia una ciudad en la cual la fe lo mueve todo en esos bellos cielos junto a la bella Elizabeth.Ken nos une ambas historias (Rapture y Columbia) de una manera magistral junto con un final hecho para que te hagas tantas preguntas que al responderlas sientas ese asombro de descubrir la verdad.En resumen toda una obra maestra que sin duda todo jugador sabra reconocer como una de las mejores sagas de estos ultimos años.

Um jogo que eu achei que não daria nada por ele, que era pura midia, que tinha uma personagem bonitinha e por isso era tão famoso. Acho que as vezes que fui mais feliz na vida, foi quando esta me pregou uma peça, e me fez surpreenderme com algo que eu não esperaria poder tirar felicidade, foi assim com Bioshock. História no inicio parecendo meio vaga e confusa, mas que aos poucos vai te preendendo mesmo que você não entenda muita coisa, personagens com emoçoes fortes, drama, muita ação. Sem contar Elizabeth, que é a garota mais pura e ao mesmo tempo perspicaz que já vi em um game. O final, só não vou comentar pra não estragar, perfeito. Sem duvida vai para o meu top 10 dos melhores jogos da minha vida, me ensinou uma lição sobre julgar games antes de jogar, e outra de vida, o jogo te faz questionar o mundo, e a si mesmo.
Excellent jeux, j'aurais pu l'acheter rien que pour le scénario et l'ambiance, j'en aurais été tout autant satisfait

Oque posso dizer sobre esse jogo?! Simplesmente PERFEITO!

Elizabeth amorzinho total <3 <3 <3

Quite a wonderful game. It has a fun story, stylistic graphics, and a good feel. I had some issues with the gameplay as it generally doesn't work how I like to game. However, I really do reccomend this for anyone who is a fan of the bioshock world or enjoyed any other XShock game that has been made.

As someone who has never played any other bioshock before this, i can say that the game has a great gameplay, but it is easier to play with a joypad. the plot is one of the best i've ever seen, even if the final is hard to understand unless you are aware of all the informations that you get during the game. I loved the main characters and also the villain, but i can't say anything more about them not to spoil.
Sehr viel Spaß gemacht, und eine tolle Geschichte wird auch noch erzählt.

Steam上的第一篇评测，献给我最最钟爱的游戏——Bioshock Infinite!
说来惭愧，游戏发售仅数月后，我便盗版通关了一次。
而且是在没有任何剧透的情况下，通关了这款游戏。
入了正版后，我再一次通关了这款游戏。
这款游戏对我的影响有多大，[spoiler]我的Steam的账号——willthecirclebeunbroken，我的贴吧ID——循环不会终止。[/spoiler]
对于这款以剧情为主打的FPS游戏，本体的剧情已经足够让我叹为观止，海葬的两部曲更是将剧情推上了新的高度，最终结局与一代开场剧情相衔接在一起，三部曲至此完美收官。
有人认为还会有下一部生化奇兵作品出现，但我个人觉得不太可能，因为三部曲已经讲完了这个故事。
[spoiler] 从销魂城，到天空之城哥伦比亚，再回到销魂城，最后一个循环也已终止。伊丽莎白梦中的巴黎，终究也只是在梦中罢了[/spoiler]
最近的游戏中，给我这种感慨的只有一款，《SOMA》在此安利给大家，不过得提醒诸位，没通关前不要看剧透，千万别看！
Хорошая музыка + хорошая графика + хороший сюжет = хорошая игра
